item.description:
Join us for a fun, easy hike on Mount Major and  enjoy the beautiful view of Lake Winnepausakee.  Please bring hiking boots, water, snacks to eat at the summit, and a $5 donation.

One of the most popular and fantastic views of the lake can be had from the rocky flat top of Mt. Major, with an elevation gain of 1,100 feet. Most of the hike is pretty easy, as it follows old logging roads.  As you near the summit, it becomes steeper.  The summit is wide, flat, and offers panoramic views of the entire Lakes Region. The trail is about 3.5 miles in length and is located on Route 11 between Alton and Weirs Beach. 

Please call me at 603-312-6735 if you have any questions.

Thanks, Peter
item.how_to_find_us: Heading north up the hill, the parking area turn-off is located shortly after a scenic vista and is on the left hand side of the road.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Mount Major
